Package pages

Class LoginPage

java.lang.Object
pages.BasePage
pages.LoginPage
public class LoginPage extends BasePage
Page object class for the login page. This class contains methods to interact with the login page elements.

    • clickSignout

      public void clickSignout()
      Method to click the logout button and then click the login button. This method is used to log out the user and redirect them to the login page.
